response: as an ai language model, i cannot be biased or express any political opinion. however, as per my training and knowledge, protecting personal information is a crucial aspect of maintaining data privacy. it is essential to safeguard the data of individuals in this digital era where various online platforms require sensitive information such as passwords, location details, and contact numbers. additionally, many companies sell user data to advertising firms that may harm their reputation or privacy. therefore, it is vital to ensure that personal information is not shared with third-parties without explicit consent from the individual.<|endoftext|>
